## ‚òÄÔ∏è Morning Brief ‚Äî Tuesday, January 27, 2026

### üéØ Suggested #1 Priority

> **Make the most of Byron face time in Seattle.** You're at the Microsoft Visit with extended access to Byron, Glenn, TJ, and leadership. Use informal moments (dinner, breaks) to soft-pitch the **Innovation Sprint** ‚Äî thesis v0.1 is complete, now shape the narrative. Also plant seeds on **Cheryl ‚Üí EA backfill** and get alignment on **Crema/Certs**. (G2: Innovation Leadership, G4: EA Practice)

### üìÖ Today's Meetings ‚Äî Context & Prep

| Time | Meeting | Context | Things 3 Tasks | Prep Needed |
|------|---------|---------|----------------|-------------|
| All Day | **Microsoft Visit ‚Äî Redmond** | Strategic visit with Byron, Glenn, TJ, Bret, Brandon. TJ departs tonight for London. | Talk to Byron on Crema/Certs, Book NYC Glenn/Claude trip | **Yes** ‚Äî Innovation Sprint pitch ready |
| 10:00 | Lockton & Deloitte - Messaging | New Deloitte resources integration (Shanna, Stephanie Reid) | ‚Äì | Join remotely if possible |
| ‚Äì | AH Sprint 3 Review/Demo | Associate Hub sprint demo ‚Äî attend if time permits | ‚Äì | No |
| ‚Äì | ~~M-Files Integration~~ | **CANCELED** ‚Äî key people unavailable | ‚Äì | No |
| ‚Äì | DRC Dallas annual event | Can't attend ‚Äî you're in Seattle | ‚Äì | No |

### ‚úÖ Things 3: Today

- **Synthesize Summit & Hackathon survey results ‚Üí deck for Byron** üìÖ 1/30 ‚Üê Have talking points ready
- **Talk to Byron on Crema/Certs** ‚Üê Today in Seattle
- **Book NYC Glenn/Claude trip** ‚Üê Quick win, 10 mins
- **Thomas - Create 90 day plan** ‚Üê Can wait
- **Call Nav on Puru promotion** ‚Üê If you get a break

### üî• Open Threads to Track

| Thread | Status | From |
|--------|--------|------|
| **Innovation Thesis** | ‚úÖ v0.1 COMPLETE | [[Innovation Thesis]] |
| **Innovation Sprint pitch** | üéØ Shape narrative for Byron today | Seattle window |
| **Perficient EA proposal** | ‚è≥ Waiting ‚Äî due Thu 1/30 | Follow up Wed if silent |
| **Forrester EA Assessment** | ‚è≥ Waiting on Jonathan Jenkins | G4 |
| **M-Files rollout** | üîÑ 5/1 unrealistic ‚Äî meeting canceled today | Reconvene next week |
| **Promotions comms** | üìÖ Target 2/1 (Larry/Mark/Brooke) | G3 |
| **Cheryl backfill ‚Üí EA** | üí¨ Pitch to Byron in Seattle | G4 |

### üîó Connections Today

- **Byron Clymer** ‚Äî Key relationship. Pitch Innovation Sprint informally. Also: Crema/Certs decision, Cheryl ‚Üí EA idea.
- **Glenn Feldman** ‚Äî On the trip. London dates confirmed ‚úÖ. Book NYC trip with him.
- **TJ Mann** ‚Äî Departs tonight for London. Any CISO alignment needed?
- **Brandon Pennington** ‚Äî M-Files risk owner. Meeting canceled, but he's in Seattle.
- **Shanna Sommers** ‚Äî Deloitte meeting today. Innovation Sprint committee member.
- **Survey deck** ‚Äî Byron may ask about Hackathon results. Have key themes ready.

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Heads Up

1. üå®Ô∏è **Yesterday was brutal** ‚Äî Ice storm travel delays. You're starting tired. Pace yourself.
2. ‚úÖ **January milestone ACHIEVED** ‚Äî Innovation thesis v0.1 complete. Now shape the pitch.
3. üìÖ **Perficient deadline** ‚Äî Proposal due Thu 1/30. Follow up mid-week if silent.
4. üéØ **Strategic window** ‚Äî Microsoft Visit = rare extended face time with leadership. Don't waste it on sidebar asks.
5. üì± **Vinay** ‚Äî Submit CO bighorn sheep photo for Texas TSA contest (from yesterday's capture).

Get the **survey synthesis** polished and **Innovation Sprint plan** sharpened ‚Äî you'll need these before the 2/7 deadline anyway. Schedule a 1:1 with Byron this week to deliver the pitch you would've given in Seattle. (G2: Innovation Leadership)

| Time | Meeting | Mode | Your Engagement | Multitask Window? |

| TBD | AH Sprint 3 Review | üñ•Ô∏è Teams | Light ‚Äî listen for issues | ‚ö° Background OK |
| Evening | DRC Dallas annual event | üè¢ Local | **Optional** ‚Äî you're in Dallas! | Consider attending |

**Virtual Reality:** You'll be a face on a screen while the team is in-person. Stay visible ‚Äî camera on, nod, ask 1-2 good questions. But use low-engagement windows (demos, deep technical dives not in your lane) for focused work.

### ‚ö° Multitask Priorities (for low-engagement windows)

| 1Ô∏è‚É£ | **Synthesize survey deck** ‚Äî polish key themes | 45-60 min | Due 1/30, feeds Innovation Sprint |
| 2Ô∏è‚É£ | **Call Nav on Puru promotion** | 15 min | Open thread, close it |
| 3Ô∏è‚É£ | **Book NYC Glenn/Claude trip** | 10 min | Quick win, off the list |
| 4Ô∏è‚É£ | **Thomas - 90 day plan** | 30 min | Draft outline |
| 5Ô∏è‚É£ | **Schedule Byron 1:1** | 5 min | Replace the lost Seattle pitch |

### ‚úÖ Things 3: Today

- **Synthesize Summit & Hackathon survey results ‚Üí deck for Byron** üìÖ 1/30 ‚Üê Polish during low-engagement
- **Talk to Byron on Crema/Certs** ‚Üê Schedule separate call or Teams chat
- **Book NYC Glenn/Claude trip** ‚Üê Quick win
- **Thomas - Create 90 day plan** ‚Üê If time
- **Call Nav on Puru promotion** ‚Üê Close this thread

### üî• Open Threads to Track

| Thread | Status | Action |
|--------|--------|--------|
| **Innovation Thesis** | ‚úÖ v0.1 COMPLETE | [[Innovation Thesis]] done! |
| **Innovation Sprint pitch** | üîÑ Lost Seattle window | Schedule Byron 1:1 this week |
| **Perficient EA proposal** | ‚è≥ Due Thu 1/30 | Follow up Wed if silent |
| **Forrester EA Assessment** | ‚è≥ Waiting on Jonathan Jenkins | G4 |
| **M-Files rollout** | üîÑ Meeting canceled | Reconvene next week |
| **Promotions comms** | üìÖ Target 2/1 | Larry/Mark/Brooke |
| **Cheryl backfill ‚Üí EA** | üí¨ Need Byron alignment | Add to Byron 1:1 agenda |

### üîó Connections Today (Virtual)

- **Byron Clymer** ‚Äî On the visit. You're a screen. Make 1-2 smart contributions. Schedule follow-up 1:1.
- **Glenn Feldman** ‚Äî Ask about NYC trip timing in chat.
- **Shanna Sommers** ‚Äî Deloitte meeting 10:00. Innovation Sprint committee member.
- **Brandon Pennington** ‚Äî M-Files owner. Meeting canceled, but may discuss in Microsoft sessions.

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Heads Up

1. üñ•Ô∏è **You're virtual** ‚Äî Lost the informal pitch window. Compensate with sharp prepared contributions.
2. üìÖ **Schedule Byron 1:1** ‚Äî Replace the lost Seattle dinner. Pitch Innovation Sprint properly.
3. üìÖ **Perficient deadline** ‚Äî Thu 1/30. Follow up Wed if silent.
